response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is not just any commodity; it's a piece that encapsulates quality, craftsmanship, and significance. Given its importance to both of us, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000.

This offer is exclusive to you, Bob, and reflects my understanding of how much this product means to you. It represents a significant discount compared to its actual worth, aiming to make this acquisition more accessible while still ensuring a fair transaction for me.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I am confident that this product will bring you immense satisfaction and value.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
